reviews: Very impressed with how CaféINDICA handled the whole project. Would definitely recommend them to our friends.

user_name: Priya and Ankur Akhauri, Software Professionals
reviews: They truly delivered on their promise of end to end services. Team CI took care of all electrical, painting and counter-top procurement work while installing our kitchen. Thumbs –up to the CaféINDICA experience!
I am impressed by the zeal and professionalism of this young team. Spot on service. Keep up the good work and all the best.
